text: Hi, there! Thanks for dropping by. Would you like to know a little bit more about Matthew McCord?
Matthew is a full stack web engineer with literally YEARS of experience  in his field! (gasp! ooh! ahh! a wizard!)
In his spare time, he loves to absorb game programming and game design knowledge, and play board games.
That's about all I can tell you now. Check out his LinkedIn, and play some of the games! :)
